categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Obai was a male Human Jedi Master living during the Galactic War. At some point he became part of the Order of Revan and defected from the Galactic Republic, joining with the Revanite forces on Rishi. During the Battle of Rishi in 3637 BBY he and a fellow Revanite Vodd tried to stop a strike team from reaching the signal jammer on the Razorback Island, but failed and were killed.
Master Obai appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
